params._period: uint index of period being queried

activeIndex(uint256).return: _index uint number of participants in period

activePeriod().return: uint period index returning subperiod of ACTIVE

addPolicyholder(address,uint256).details: modifier onlySecretary, onlyLobby Add a Policyholder to the group

params._subgroup: the subgroup they are to be added to*
params._to: the address of the Policyholder being added

calculateEndowment(uint256).details: assumption: subgroup size of 5assumption: group size of 75

params._months: uint number of months to repay a Loan

params._period: uint index of period being queried

calculateExpectedPayout(uint256).return: uint value in Dai paid to each claimant

calculateLoanPayment().return: uint value in Dai paid to administration for initial loan given

calculatePayment(address).return: uint value of Dai required to make payment

calculatePremium().return: uint value in Dai paid to cover claim payouts

params._policyholder: the address of the policyholder switching groups

params._period: uint index of period being queried

claimIndex(uint256).return: _index uint number of Claims opened during the Period

defect(uint256).details: modifier onlyPolicyholder, allowed() Defect from an insurance group during a given period

params._period: the period of the group being defected from

doNext().return: true if the next flag is up, and false otherwise

params._period: uint index of Period being queried for defections
params._subgroup: uint index of Subgroup being queried for defections

params._index: uint index of subgroup being queried

params._period: uint index of Period being queried for subperiod state

getSubperiod(uint256).return: uint the integer representation of the subperiod

indexToClaimant(uint256,uint256).return: _claimant address of claimant stored at the given index; returns 0 if null

indexToParticipant(uint256,uint256).return: _participant address of participant stored at the given index; returns 0 if null

params._query: address being checked for role of claimant

isClaimant(uint256,address).return: _index uint index in claimant mapping; 0 if not claimant

isLobby().return: true if the current active period is Lobby, and false otherwise

params._query: address being checked for role of participant

isParticipant(uint256,address).return: _index uint index in participants mapping; 0 if not participant

params._query: address being queried for policyholder role

isPolicyholder(address).return: _subgroup uint subgroup index of policyholder; returns 0 if not policyholder

loaned().return: true if a loan was previously issued to the group, and false otherwise

makeLoan(uint256,uint256).details: onlyPrimary Give a new loan to the Group contract

params._debt: Dai value given to the Secretary by the Insurance Service
params._months: uint number of months to repay loan to underwriter

makePayment(uint256).details: modifier onlyPolicyholder, allowed() Make a payment to participate in a period's insurance contract Includes premium, overpayment, and loan repayment

params._period: the period number to make payment for

removePolicyholder(address).details: modifier onlySecretary, onlyLobby Remove a Policyholder from the group

params._from: the address of the Policyholder being removed*

startGroup().details: modifier onlySecretary, onlyLobby Exit the lobby and begin cycling through periods

stopGroup().details: modifier onlySecretary Stop a Group from advancing to the next Periodwill only work on days 3-30

submitClaim(uint256,address).details: modifier onlySecretary, allowed() Submit a new claim

params._period: uint period under which claim will be submitted

viewLoan().return: _debt uint value of Dai still owed to the Insurance Service_months uint number of months left to repay loan

params._period: uint index of period being viewed

viewPool(uint256).return: _pool uint value of Dai stored during that Period

withdraw().details: modifier onlySecretary, liquidityLock Withdraw all Dai in the liquidity contract to the Secretary account address

withdrawable().return: true if the liquidity contract can be emptied, and false otherwise

loaned().notice: Determine whether the group is currently paying back a loan

viewLoan().notice: Determine the current status of the Group's Loan

viewPool(uint256).notice: Determine the liquidity in a given Period's Dai Pool

withdrawable().notice: Determine whether the liquidity contract can be withdrawn from currently
